Subject

Membership Dues
YYYY - YYYY
*|FNAME|* – please see the invoice below for your annual Rotaract membership dues. This invoice is due and payable upon receipt. Please remit payment by August 1st, *|CURRENT_YEAR|*¹ either online, by credit card at a luncheon or by check. Thank you in advance for your prompt payment and your continued support of our community and Club!
DescriptionQuantityAmount
Membership Dues²1$350
Foundation Endowment1$20
Foundation Ball Tickets³2$100
Total Due$470
Pay membership dues
If paying by check, ensure your name listed in the memo line. Please remit payment to:
Attention: Treasurer
*|LIST:COMPANY|*
PO Box 13798
Birmingham, AL 35202
Please contact VP Finance should you have any questions regarding your invoice or would like assistance in the form of an employer letter.
¹ Payments not received within thirty (30) days of the invoice date will be subject to a $25 late fee.
² Semi-annual installment plans are also available (subject to a $5 convenience fee per payment), for two (2) payments of $190 in lieu of one (1) $370 payment. Please note that if you choose to pay in installments, you remain obligated to pay both installments even if you choose to leave the Club at any time during the year.
³ Members are required to purchase two (2) tickets for the annual Foundation Ball benefitting the Rotaract Club of Birmingham Foundation. Members may purchase their Foundation Ball tickets early to fulfill all financial obligations for the term. Should you opt to not purchase tickets at this time you will be invoiced in January.
Developing young leaders to be actively engaged in building a better community, region and world.
